review_blob: Judging from previous reviews I have to conclude theres no account for tastes. As for me, this is the IPA Ive been looking forevery bit as fine as my first IPA years ago. And its the first real thrill Ive had tasting a new brew since thenmaking Big Sky IPA for me literally "one in thousands". Its not your fathers yellow beer, and light beer drinkers may want to dilute it with equal parts of seltzer water.
